title: How to Summon Golden Freddy in Five Nights at Freddy's

steps.headline: Start a night.
steps.description: Then open the monitor and go to CAM 2B (West Hall Corner) and flip the monitor up and down until you see a poster of a close-up of Golden Freddy's face. Note that this method does not work on Android devices.

steps.headline: Close the monitor when you see the poster.
steps.description: You'll see Golden Freddy sitting in front of you.

steps.headline: Flip up the monitor.
steps.description: If you want him to kill you, just leave him there for a few seconds, but opening the monitor is the only way (besides completing a night) for him to disappear.

steps.headline: Beat Night 6.
steps.description: You have now unlocked the Custom Night, go into the menu.

steps.headline: Press "READY."
steps.description: This will cause Golden Freddy's kill screen to appear and, once again, crash/freeze your game.

text: Using the Golden Freddy Poster Start a night. Then open the monitor and go to CAM 2B (West Hall Corner) and flip the monitor up and down until you see a poster of a close-up of Golden Freddy's face. Note that this method does not work on Android devices. Close the monitor when you see the poster. You'll see Golden Freddy sitting in front of you. Flip up the monitor. If you want him to kill you, just leave him there for a few seconds, but opening the monitor is the only way (besides completing a night) for him to disappear. Entering a Code 1\/9\/8\/7 Beat Night 6. You have now unlocked the Custom Night, go into the menu. Enter 1/9/8/7 into the AI settings.  Press "READY." This will cause Golden Freddy's kill screen to appear and, once again, crash/freeze your game.
